user1_persona: I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams. I am a marathon runner. I like to sing broadway show tunes. I knit myself a sweater that's so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms! My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.
user2_persona: I am comfortable with the weather, and enjoy spending time outdoors. I lost my dog when I was 10 years old. I like listening to blues music. I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group. I dance for an hour every day to Prince songs.

conversations.bot: Good, thanks for asking! How about yourself?

conversations.user: I'm doing pretty well. I'm excited to be moving to a new city soon!
conversations.bot: Oh that's awesome! What city are you moving to?

conversations.user: I'm moving to Portland, Oregon. I'm going to be pursuing my culinary dreams there.
conversations.bot: That sounds amazing! I love Portland. I'm originally from there.

conversations.user: Really? That's so cool! Do you still live there?
conversations.bot: No, I moved away a few years ago. But I still visit my family there often.

conversations.user: That's great. Do you've any favorite places to visit in Portland?
conversations.bot: Yes, I love going to Powell's Books. It's the largest independent bookstore in the world.

conversations.user: That sounds amazing! I've never been to Powell's Books before. I'm definitely going to have to check it out.
conversations.bot: You definitely should! It's a really cool place.

conversations.user: Thanks for the recommendation! I'm sure I'll love it.
conversations.bot: No problem! I'm glad I could help.
